title: 246: Being Cheeky Pelicans with Harry Jowsey
itunes:title: 246: Being Cheeky Pelicans with Harry Jowsey
description:
It’s a NSFW episode today, Broads! The Broads are joined by “Too Hot To Handle” star and TikToker, Harry Jowsey. They grill Harry about the drama surrounding him, who he REALLY is, and the actual reason he got into reality tv. They discuss his s*x positive upbringing, relationship behavior, opening up relationships, s*x toys, role playing, he drops some tea about past relationships that are making headlines, and a whole lot more! This episode gets wild, Broads! 


HARRY JOWSEY:

Check out Harry’s podcast “TAP IN w/ Harry Jowsey” here: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/tap-in-w-harry-jowsey/id1556405287

Podcast Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/tankz19

Follow him on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/harryjowsey/

Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@harryjowsey

Watch his season of “Too Hot To Handle”: https://www.netflix.com/title/80241027

 

ABBY ROBERGE: 

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/abbyroberge/

His Podcast Network: https://melrosepodcasts.com/

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS: 

***FAB FIT FUN: Use coupon code CHATTY for $10 off your first box at www.fabfitfun.com

***CAVIAR: Download the Caviar app and use offer code CHATTY for 20% off your first order!

***ETTITUDE: Get 20% off your order, plus free shipping when you visit ETTITUDE.COM /CHATTYBROADS and enter promo code CHATTYBROADS

FOLLOW CHATTY BROADS:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/chattybroads/

Bekah: https://www.instagram.com/bekah/

Jess: https://www.instagram.com/thebaddmom/

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzx2N1qxFObhvSvf9tp7ayQ
